name: Facebook Fans by Country
description: See where your most Facebook fans are located. Originates from the Gallery.

facebook.name: Facebook Fans by Country
facebook.description: Aggregated, lifetime Facebook location data, sorted by country, about the people who like your page (Unique Users). Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.label: Facebook Page Name
datasourceConfigModel.description: To find your page name, navigate to your company Facebook page. The page name can be found in the address bar between 'facebook.com/' and the question mark. For example, capture 'klipfolio' from 'facebook.com/klipfolio?'.
